page.title: 07PUBLIC TRANSPORT (CONT)
page.content: Doncaster is 20p whilst the fare from Norton to Pontefract in West Yorkshire which is the equivelant distance is 85p. Senior citizens travel free for much of the day and children travel at a very much reduced rate i.e. 4p from Norton to Doncaster. Norton has three services per hour,the 406 York/Doncaster, the 411 Airedale/Doncaster and the 412 Doncaster/Castleford. Campsall have the same services plus an additional service five times a day the 513 which runs to Doncaster via Carcroft. In addition there is one additional service on a Saturday which is for disabled persons, the 589 which also goes to Doncaster via Carcroft.
